price: 116. Jie tarė: „Jei tu nesiliausi, Nūhai (Nojau), tikrai būsi tarp užmėtytųjų akmenimis (užmuštųjų).“
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
